name: Hostile Hyper Jump
description:
Jump into hyperspace, see the wonders of the universe and meet magnificent alien races. *Hostile* alien races, I meant to say.

Keyboard Controls

Movement = Arrow keys | WASD
Shooting = Space | J
Reduce speed = Left shift | H

Invert Vertical Movement = I

Gamepad Controls

Movement = Left thumb stick
Shooting = Button 1 | Button 2
Reduce speed = Button 3 | Button 4

Developer's comments

Originally a Mini Ludum Dare 72 entry.

Mini Ludum Dare 72 Page

Version log
